div.p: ... 30 7/12 (artabas) ... 28 3/4 (artabas) ... 264 5/6 (artabas) ... (?) (artabas). For a total of 932 (artabas) ... (the amount handed over?) to the police ... 1,237 7/12 (artabas) ... namely the ones from Dionysios (the [archiphylakitÃªs and?] (from) Aristonikos ... for Philagris, 9 1/2 (artabas), for Neilopolis, 30 5/6 (artabas), for Andromachis, 49 1/2 (artabas). For a total of 89 5/6 (artabas). Translation with minor modifications: R.L. Phillips, CdE 95 (2020) 89
